entities.name: malfoy manor
entities.description: The location where the scene is taking place. It is mentioned as the place where Hermione and others are being held captive.

entities.name: greyback
entities.description: A Death Eater who is forcing Harry, Ron, and others to move through a dark passageway. He has a wand that projects an invisible force.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A person who is being held captive at Malfoy Manor. She is freed by the woman with the silver knife.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A person who is being held captive at Malfoy Manor. He can feel Ron shaking.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A person who is being held captive at Malfoy Manor. He is shaking and tied back-to-back with Harry.

entities.name: the woman
entities.description: The person who is holding Hermione and others captive. She has a silver knife and throws Greyback's wand back to him.

relationships.description: Greyback is forcing Hermione and others to move through a dark passageway.
